about_the_game:
The Deepwater is an underwater horde escape game with horror elements.


You control a small, weak ship and must attempt to navigate and blast your way to freedom as you try to find an exit in this giant underwater chamber. But, be warned, you never know what might lurk in the depths...

Horde Meets Underwater Horror


A unique fusion of the popular horde-style genre with classic indie horror in an aquatic environment.

Escape Instead Of Survive


Unlike traditional horde games, the goal of The Deepwater is to escape before you die, instead of surviving a certain amount of time.

Fine-tuned Underwater Controls


Ship controls are tuned to feel like you're really underwater!
